actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend section 217 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that military moving expense reimbursements are excluded from income without regard to the deductibility of the expenses reimbursed.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from income military moving and storage expense reimbursements without regard to the deductibility of such expenses.

titles.title: To amend section 217 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that military moving expense reimbursements are excluded from income without regard to the deductibility of the expenses reimbursed.
